title: A Class in ‘Dreyer’s English’
description: Benjamin Dreyer discusses his best-selling book about writing, and Thomas Mallon discusses “Landfall,” his new novel about the presidential administration of George W. Bush.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
